mainBoard.name: Dragonlord's Servant
mainBoard.originalText: Dragon spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

rulings.text: Dragonlord's Servant can't reduce the colored mana requirement of a Dragon spell you cast.
If there are any additional costs to cast a Dragon spell, apply those before applying Dragonlord's Servant and any other cost reductions.
The ability can apply to alternative costs to cast a Dragon spell.

To determine the total cost of a spell, start with the mana cost or alternative cost (such as a flashback cost) you're paying, add any cost increases, then apply any cost reductions. The mana value of the spell is determined only by its mana cost, no matter what the total cost to cast the spell was.
Dragonlord's Servant's ability can't reduce the amount of colored mana you pay for a spell. It reduces only the generic mana component of that spell.
Dragonlord's Servant's ability doesn't change the mana cost or mana value of any spell. It changes only the total cost you pay to cast Dragon spells.

mainBoard.originalText: Scorching Dragonfire deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If that creature or planeswalker would die this turn, exile it instead.

rulings.text: Scorching Dragonfire's replacement effect will exile the target creature or planeswalker if it would die this turn for any reason, not just due to lethal damage. It applies to the target creature or planeswalker even if Scorching Dragonfire deals no damage to it (most likely due to a prevention effect).
Scorching Dragonfire's replacement effect will exile the target creature or planeswalker if it would die this turn for any reason, not just due to lethal damage.
Scorching Dragonfire's replacement effect will exile the target creature or planeswalker if it would die this turn for any reason, not just due to lethal damage.

mainBoard.text: Scorching Dragonfire deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If that creature or planeswalker would die this turn, exile it instead.

mainBoard.flavorText: The people of Tarkir speak of an ancient legend, of the dragon-man called Sarkhan who was greatest of all khans.

foreignData.flavorText: 一则古老传说辗转流述于鞑契人民之间：有位名为萨坎的龙人，是可汗中的可汗。
foreignData.name: 萨坎之怒
foreignData.text: 萨坎之怒对任意一个目标造成5点伤害。如果你未操控龙，则萨坎之怒对你造成2点伤害。

foreignData.flavorText: Les habitants de Tarkir racontent une vieille légende, celle d'un homme-dragon nommé Sarkhan, le plus grand de tous les khans.
foreignData.name: Rage de Sarkhan
foreignData.text: La Rage de Sarkhan inflige 5 blessures à n'importe quelle cible. Si vous ne contrôlez aucun dragon, la Rage de Sarkhan vous inflige 2 blessures.

foreignData.flavorText: Die Völker Tarkirs kennen eine alte Legende über einen Drachenmenschen namens Sarkhan, dem größten aller Khane.
foreignData.name: Sarkhans Zorn
foreignData.text: Sarkhans Zorn fügt einem Ziel deiner Wahl 5 Schadenspunkte zu. Falls du keinen Drachen kontrollierst, fügt dir Sarkhans Zorn 2 Schadenspunkte zu.

foreignData.flavorText: Gli abitanti di Tarkir narrano di un'antica leggenda: un uomo-drago chiamato Sarkhan che era il più grande di tutti i khan.
foreignData.name: Furia di Sarkhan
foreignData.text: La Furia di Sarkhan infligge 5 danni a un qualsiasi bersaglio. Se non controlli Draghi, la Furia di Sarkhan ti infligge 2 danni.

foreignData.flavorText: タルキールの人々の間では、最も偉大なカンであった龍人のサルカンという者を太古の伝説として語り継いでいる。
foreignData.name: サルカンの怒り
foreignData.text: クリーチャーやプレインズウォーカーやプレイヤーのうち１つを対象とする。サルカンの怒りはそれに５点のダメージを与える。あなたがドラゴンをコントロールしていないなら、サルカンの怒りはあなたに２点のダメージを与える。

foreignData.flavorText: En Tarkir se cuenta una antigua leyenda sobre un hombre dragón llamado Sarkhan, que fue el más grande de todos los kans.
foreignData.name: Furia de Sarkhan
foreignData.text: La Furia de Sarkhan hace 5 puntos de daño a cualquier objetivo. Si no controlas ningún Dragón, la Furia de Sarkhan te hace 2 puntos de daño.

mainBoard.name: Sarkhan's Rage
mainBoard.originalText: Sarkhan's Rage deals 5 damage to any target. If you control no Dragons, Sarkhan's Rage deals 2 damage to you.

rulings.text: Sarkhan's Rage checks whether you control a Dragon as it resolves.

mainBoard.text: Sarkhan's Rage deals 5 damage to any target. If you control no Dragons, Sarkhan's Rage deals 2 damage to you.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"Unwelcome thoughts crowd my mind. Are they my own madness, or the whispers of another?"
—Sarkhan Vol

foreignData.flavorText:
「讨厌的想法在我脑海中挥之不去。这是我自己的疯狂，还是他者的细语？」
～萨坎沃
foreignData.name: 折磨幽声
foreignData.text:
弃一张牌，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。
抓两张牌。

foreignData.flavorText:
« Des pensées inopportunes m'emplissent l'esprit. Sont-elles le reflet de ma propre folie, ou les murmures d'une autre ? »
—Sarkhan Vol
foreignData.name: Voix lancinante
foreignData.text:
En tant que coût supplémentaire pour lancer ce sort, défaussez-vous d'une carte.
Piochez deux cartes.

foreignData.flavorText:
„Unwillkommene Gedanken drängen sich in meinem Kopf. Sind das die Ausgeburten meines eigenen Wahns oder das Flüstern eines Anderen?"
—Sarkhan Vol
foreignData.name: Quälende Stimme
foreignData.text:
Wirf als zusätzliche Kosten, um diesen Zauberspruch zu wirken, eine Karte ab.
Ziehe zwei Karten.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Pensieri molesti affollano la mia mente. Sono il frutto della mia stessa follia o i sussurri di un estraneo?"
—Sarkhan Vol
foreignData.name: Voce Torturante
foreignData.text:
Come costo addizionale per lanciare questa magia, scarta una carta.
Pesca due carte.

foreignData.flavorText:
「不愉快な思考が私の精神を圧迫する。これは私の狂気によるものなのか、それとも誰か別の者の囁きなのか？」
――サルカン・ヴォル
foreignData.name: 苦しめる声
foreignData.text:
この呪文を唱えるための追加コストとして、カード１枚を捨てる。
カード２枚を引く。

foreignData.flavorText:
"En mi mente se agolpan pensamientos no deseados. ¿Son fruto de mi propia locura, o solo son los susurros de la de otro?".
—Sarkhan Vol
foreignData.name: Voz del tormento
foreignData.text:
Como coste adicional para lanzar este hechizo, descarta una carta.
Roba dos cartas.

mainBoard.name: Tormenting Voice
mainBoard.originalText:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards.

rulings.text: You must discard exactly one card to cast Tormenting Voice; you can't cast it without discarding a card, and you can't discard additional cards.
You must discard exactly one card to cast Tormenting Voice; you can't cast it without discarding a card, and you can't discard additional cards.

mainBoard.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards.

foreignData.name: 巨龙宝库
foreignData.text:
每当一个龙在你的操控下进战场时，在巨龙宝库上放置一个黄金指示物。
{T}，从巨龙宝库上移去一个黄金指示物：抓一张牌。
{T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力。

foreignData.name: Butin du dragon
foreignData.text:
À chaque fois qu'un dragon arrive sur le champ de bataille sous votre contrôle, mettez un marqueur « or » sur le Butin du dragon.
{T}, retirez un marqueur « or » du Butin du dragon : Piochez une carte.
{T} : Ajoutez un mana de la couleur de votre choix.

foreignData.name: Hort des Drachen
foreignData.text:
Immer wenn ein Drache unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel kommt, lege eine Goldmarke auf den Hort des Drachen.
{T}, entferne eine Goldmarke vom Hort des Drachen: Ziehe eine Karte.
{T}: Erzeuge ein Mana einer beliebigen Farbe.

foreignData.name: Bottino del Drago
foreignData.text:
Ogniqualvolta un Drago entra nel campo di battaglia sotto il tuo controllo, metti un segnalino oro sul Bottino del Drago.
{T}, Rimuovi un segnalino oro dal Bottino del Drago: Pesca una carta.
{T}: Aggiungi un mana di un qualsiasi colore.

foreignData.name: ドラゴンの財宝
foreignData.text:
ドラゴン１体があなたのコントロール下で戦場に出るたび、ドラゴンの財宝の上に黄金カウンター１個を置く。
{T},ドラゴンの財宝の上から黄金カウンター１個を取り除く：カード１枚を引く。
{T}：好きな色１色のマナ１点を加える。

foreignData.name: Botín del dragón
foreignData.text:
Siempre que un Dragón entre al campo de batalla bajo tu control, pon un contador de oro sobre el Botín del dragón.
{T}, remover un contador de oro del Botín del dragón: Roba una carta.
{T}: Agrega un maná de cualquier color.

mainBoard.name: Dragon's Hoard
mainBoard.originalText:
Whenever a Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, put a gold counter on Dragon's Hoard.
{T}, Remove a gold counter from Dragon's Hoard: Draw a card.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
mainBoard.text:
Whenever a Dragon you control enters, put a gold counter on this artifact.
{T}, Remove a gold counter from this artifact: Draw a card.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

mainBoard.flavorText: As eons passed, the rock wore away, revealing the rich colors at the mountain's heart.

foreignData.flavorText: 无数世代过去，石头磨损，显露出高山核心处的丰富颜色。
foreignData.name: 兴旺绝壁
foreignData.text:
兴旺绝壁须横置进战场。
于兴旺绝壁进战场时，选择一种红色以外的颜色。
{T}：加{R}或一点所选颜色的法术力。

foreignData.flavorText: Au fil des éons, la pierre s'est érodée, révélant les couleurs vives du cœur de la montagne.
foreignData.name: Promontoire prospère
foreignData.text:
Le Promontoire prospère arrive sur le champ de bataille engagé.
Au moment où le Promontoire prospère arrive sur le champ de bataille, choisissez une couleur autre que le rouge.
{T} : Ajoutez {R} ou un mana de la couleur choisie.

foreignData.flavorText: Im Laufe der Äonen wurde der Fels abgetragen, sodass die satten Farben im Herzen des Gebirges sichtbar wurden.
foreignData.name: Gedeihende Felsklippe
foreignData.text:
Die Gedeihende Felsklippe kommt getappt ins Spiel.
Sowie die Gedeihende Felsklippe ins Spiel kommt, bestimme eine Farbe außer Rot.
{T}: Erzeuge {R} oder ein Mana der bestimmten Farbe.

foreignData.flavorText: Col passare delle ere, la pietra si erose, rivelando i brillanti colori nel cuore della montagna.
foreignData.name: Falesia Florida
foreignData.text:
La Falesia Florida entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpata.
Mentre la Falesia Florida entra nel campo di battaglia, scegli un colore diverso dal rosso.
{T}: Aggiungi {R} o un mana del colore scelto.

foreignData.flavorText: 悠久の時を経て岩肌は削られ、山の中心の豊かな色彩が露わになった。
foreignData.name: 興隆する絶壁
foreignData.text:
興隆する絶壁はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
興隆する絶壁が戦場に出るに際し、赤でない色１色を選ぶ。
{T}：{R} か、その選ばれた色のマナ１点を加える。

foreignData.flavorText: A medida que pasaban los siglos, la roca se iba erosionando, revelando así los bellos colores del corazón de la montaña.
foreignData.name: Risco floreciente
foreignData.text:
El Risco floreciente entra al campo de batalla girado.
En cuanto el Risco floreciente entre al campo de batalla, elige un color que no sea rojo.
{T}: Agrega {R} o un maná del color elegido.

mainBoard.name: Thriving Bluff
mainBoard.originalText:
Thriving Bluff enters the battlefield tapped.
As Thriving Bluff enters the battlefield, choose a color other than red.
{T}: Add {R} or one mana of the chosen color.
mainBoard.text:
This land enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color other than red.
{T}: Add {R} or one mana of the chosen color.
